price: 穆萨说：“刚才我忘了你的嘱咐，请你不要责备我，不要以我所为难的事责备我！”
arabic: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنِي بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرۡهِقۡنِي مِنۡ أَمۡرِي عُسۡرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tuākhidh'nī bimā nasītu walā tur'hiq'nī min amrī ʿus'ran
